solution_line_template: Joey will earn {lawns_mowed} * ${pay_per_lawn} = $<<{lawns_mowed}*{pay_per_lawn}={lawn_earnings}>>{lawn_earnings} mowing his neighbors’ lawns.
He will earn {figures_sold} * ${price_per_figure} = $<<{figures_sold}*{price_per_figure}={figure_earnings}>>{figure_earnings} selling his collectable figures.
He will earn {job_hours} * ${pay_per_hour} = $<<{job_hours}*{pay_per_hour}={job_earnings}>>{job_earnings} at his after-school job.
